/contact/blog.url.name: blog.url
/contact/blog.url.description: I sometimes write but there's not much to see. More stuff anytime soon? Who knows.

/contact/email.url.name: email.url
/contact/email.url.description: My personal email. Please do not share it with anyone else. I will not share it with anyone else (this text was generated by Github Copilot and I love it)

/contact/github.url.name: github.url
/contact/github.url.description: A Github page of mine. Some of my actual paid work is open-source, so you can take a peek at that too.

/experiments/favicon-player.url.name: favicon-player.url
/experiments/favicon-player.url.description: Utilizing WebCodecs API to convert & play video stream in a website favicon. I think WebCodecs API is a great addition to the web platform.

/experiments/fibonacci-indent.url.name: fibonacci-indent.url
/experiments/fibonacci-indent.url.description: Atom (you will never be forgotten) package that adjusts your indentation according to the Fibonacci sequence. Tabs or spaces, it doesn't matter. It's all about the numbers.

/experiments/misbrands.url.name: misbrands.url
/experiments/misbrands.url.description: A collection of slightly cursed programming stickers. Print and hand them out on the next conference! Check out the pull requests for more stickers.

/experiments/nodecg-layouts.url.name: nodecg-layouts.url
/experiments/nodecg-layouts.url.description: A NodeCG (broadcast graphics software) starter bundle for an easy state-to-replicant management. Words probably don't make sense, unless you come from the NodeCG world.

/experiments/pgrant.url.name: pgrant.url
/experiments/pgrant.url.description: A GUI wrapper for distributing promotional items in Valve Software games.

/experiments/rack-timeout.url.name: rack-timeout.url
/experiments/rack-timeout.url.description: A fork of Rack::Timeout that can be configured to ignore certain Rails request routes. Made for a Stack Overflow question with a bounty :)

/experiments/table-debugger.url.name: table-debugger.url
/experiments/table-debugger.url.description: My first Arduino project is connecting Chrome Developer tools to a table. Smash it for the next breakpoint and an instant stress relief.

/experiments/trow.url.name: trow.url
/experiments/trow.url.description: An extremely basic (just the way I like it) version of the scrum poker. Works over WebRTC.

/experiments/ttty.url.name: ttty.url
/experiments/ttty.url.description: A very simple pure JS lightweight terminal "emulator" that's powering this very website. I managed to squeeze the basic functionality into ~5kb (non-minified).
